parameters.label: Camera
parameters.infoText: Whether to affect the main game camera or the hud camera.

parameters.label: Opacity
parameters.infoText: How opaque the camera should be. 1 is fully visible, and 0 is fully invisible.

parameters.label: Time (Seconds)
parameters.infoText: How long the transition to this alpha should last, in seconds. Set to 0 to instantly snap to the target alpha.

parameters.label: Trigger at Start
parameters.infoText: If checked, this event will trigger when the song first loads in instead of triggering where it's placed in the song.
